name: AfroWorld Groceries
hours: Mon-Sat: 9 AM - 7 PM, Sun: 11 AM - 5 PM
description: Your one-stop shop for authentic West African ingredients, spices, and fresh produce. We specialize in yam flour, egusi, ogbono, and a variety of halal meats.

name: Bombay Bites
description: Experience the rich flavors of India with our traditional dishes. We offer a wide range of vegetarian and vegan options, along with popular Indian groceries.

name: Middle Eastern Delights
description: Authentic Middle Eastern bakery and grocery store. Freshly baked pita, baklava, and a selection of halal meats and imported goods.

name: The Gluten-Free Pantry
address: 101 Oxford Street E, London, ON N6A 1T1
description: Dedicated to providing a safe and delicious shopping experience for those with gluten sensitivities. Find a wide array of gluten-free breads, pastas, snacks, and more.

name: Korean BBQ House
description: Authentic Korean BBQ experience with a wide selection of marinated meats and traditional side dishes. Vegan options available.

name: Caribbean Spice Market
description: Bringing the vibrant flavors of the Caribbean to London. Fresh spices, exotic fruits, and ingredients for classic Caribbean dishes.
